elements.2211.03195_dcf830a5f6f6633ad0f13a3082793: In contrast to the rapid digitalization of several industries, agriculture suffers from low adoption of climate-smart farming tools
elements.2211.03195_3ed1af51ea0517bd047b4c1706185: Even though AI-driven digital agriculture can offer high-performing predictive functionalities, it lacks tangible quantitative evidence on its benefits to the farmers
elements.2211.03195_693018095dea0a06b27509cf05f67: Field experiments can derive such evidence, but are often costly and time consuming.
elements.2211.03195_b2125de647f3446133e4cd78fb877: To this end, we propose an observational causal inference framework for the empirical evaluation of the impact of digital tools on target farm performance indicators.
elements.2211.03195_4fb020a3dc6e7a06774c5e93ffe71: This way, we can increase farmers' trust by enhancing the transparency of the digital agriculture market, and in turn accelerate the adoption of technologies that aim to increase productivity and secure a sustainable and resilient agriculture against a changing climate.
elements.2211.03195_b92e67762d972b9579d614175e7e3: As a case study, we perform an empirical evaluation of a recommendation system for optimal cotton sowing, which was used by a farmers' cooperative during the growing season of 2021
elements.2211.03195_b7ec1d7552ac17366719642417244: We leverage agricultural knowledge to develop a causal graph of the farm system, we use the back-door criterion to identify the impact of recommendations on the yield and subsequently estimate it using several methods on observational data.
elements.2211.03195_a97c713e8601ebf724aa696bfb25f: The results show that a field sown according to our recommendations enjoyed a significant increase in yield (
elements.2211.03195_b32326d874b7e0bb4df5905d9be92: The increasing global population and the changing climate are putting pressure on the agricultural sector, demanding the sustainable production of adequate quantities of nutritious food, feed and fiber
elements.2211.03195_de0e279b7e57dd1acd933e9078d3f: In this context, we need climate-smart agriculture
elements.2211.03195_4b35ea72ec46e52b3d638b676e8e7: to optimize crop management with zero waste, enhance resilience, increase production and reduce emissions
elements.2211.03195_b109edfde1e22dcef81cb72779dbd: Unfortunately, the agricultural sector experiences limited adoption of pertinent smart farming technologies
elements.2211.03195_7e099952ce616291816792fe1b77a: that could drive the required sustainable production
elements.2211.03195_29e2560b2fd0b98d5e318108db0ab: This might seem odd at first sight, given the recent surge of sophisticated digital tools that utilize Artificial Intelligence (AI) and big Earth data
elements.2211.03195_65a049c741a4397f0b23fff4b5806: ; yet farmers are skeptical about their effectiveness as most lack quantitative evidence on their benefits
elements.2211.03195_5f686b7cd1de7a039dfc10600b151: Traditionally, quantifying the impact of a service would require the design and execution of a randomized experiment
elements.2211.03195_0530e07ad7816bb6cf947cd5e5662: Nevertheless, field experiments for the evaluation of digital agriculture tools are seldom done since they are inflexible, requiring follow-up experiments for any changes in the product, but also costly and time-consuming
elements.2211.03195_3c8bf5f41b5c1eb536c86c9cb1e42: Thus, an observational causal inference framework
elements.2211.03195_29eac8b4788d54fad22924a4b3126: can fill this gap by emulating the experiment we would have liked to run
elements.2211.03195_033239204804e2ba9ec89c5587aae: Causal inference with observational data has been the subject of recent work across diverse disciplines, including ecology
elements.2211.03195_b89f800c163c3cac9d48c316b54a0: In agriculture, it has been used to identify and estimate the effect of agricultural practices on various agro-environmental metrics
elements.2211.03195_3688bd6a76f566b85acf50abb5524: According to Adelman (1992), the comprehensive evaluation of decision support systems has three facets: i) the subjective
elements.2211.03195_aac4a914f1e196ff4ef1d079f622e: While subjective and technical evaluation have been sufficiently practiced
elements.2211.03195_48d9b1a9eed8e9fd57d3d73a349a2: the empirical evaluation methods, and in particular with regards to the impact assessment of digital agriculture tools, have been seldom employed.
elements.2211.03195_1e9bc6fa121236ff59d20be5e16c9: Thus, we propose a framework for the empirical evaluation of digital agriculture recommendations with causal inference.
elements.2211.03195_cd08513a6f25a0fd49bc730273a20: In this context, we evaluate a recommendation system for the optimal sowing of cotton, given sowing time is of great importance for arable crops
elements.2211.03195_1e86fb30148210e36e715f214e6cc: Mistimed sowing can lead to suboptimal plant emergence and adversely affect the crop yield
elements.2211.03195_a901dd4af728ccc3287432011c695: To the best of our knowledge, there are no works that evaluate the effectiveness of any type of decision support or recommendation system in the agricultural sector through causal reasoning and beyond their predictive accuracy
elements.2211.03195_7b70ab64b7a20ee883d442b6dabbb: The contributions of this work are summarized as follows: i) the design of the first empirical evaluation framework for digital agriculture based on causal inference; ii) the implementation of it to assess the impact of a recommendation system, which was operationally used in a real-world case study;
elements.2211.03195_bd7239aedcc682c607e27ce787120: iii) the identification of the causal effect of sowing recommendations on yield, its subsequent estimation, and the evaluation of estimates using refutation tests.
elements.2211.03195_624f77594f024f062003560e38182: In this work, we implement the empirical evaluation of a knowledge-based recommendation system
elements.2211.03195_88bf20618958a7efcd8efcd0e7636: for optimal cotton sowing, which aims to make farmers' production, and hence their profit, resilient against climate change
elements.2211.03195_35e861e3b57b5ee84bc2a6305b79f: The recommendations are based on satisfying specific environmental conditions, as retrieved from the related literature, which would ensure successful cotton planting
elements.2211.03195_b36417a1657995f8097156baf2b17: The system is operationally deployed using high resolution weather forecasts
elements.2211.03195_4ff2ff7e3f496f34b45d3cac1b6cf: A.2 of the Appendix contains the design, implementation, algorithmic presentation and the technical evaluation of the system
elements.2211.03195_5019616ad4b9f55ec66bef34378aa: We provided the recommendations in the form of daily maps, indicating unfavorable and favorable conditions, over the fields of the participating farmers
elements.2211.03195_9ab6d3d9e593d503119d4fab0217e: The sowing recommendation maps were served through the website of their cooperative, which farmers visited on a daily basis during the growing season of 2021
elements.2211.03195_cc05c29b57cccefb25f3a2b337b18: The cooperative collected and provided the required data for each field (i.e., geo-referenced boundaries, sowing
elements.2211.03195_fc4ddcd0880e36e9f086895e3bcc7: We then combined this data with publicly available observations from heterogeneous sources (i.e., Sentinel-2 images, climate variables, soil maps) to engineer an observational dataset that enables the causal analysis.

elements.2211.03195_84f95b62c8c8b08ac9c0079a81e19: is a set of directed edges connecting them

elements.2211.03195_8f8acb1a28cde80c84d6fb3afebcf: , which we want to quantify the impact of

elements.2211.03195_97af6efa7c63968421f7a0471b6f4: , while a parent of both the treatment and outcome is referred to as a
elements.2211.03195_d6bd3ba116aeb4173a628e795093b: Our end goal is to account for exactly the variables
elements.2211.03195_e4dc97a6a5a90b36fb311e7beacab: that will allow us to estimate the Average Treatment Effect (ATE) of the treatment on outcome, as shown in Eq. (
elements.2211.03195_42ac128ac1962b6d45402d468adfb: We thus aim to develop a causal graph
elements.2211.03195_3bcbdd4311f9b6046c860e34d2ba8: capture the relevant actors of the system we study, and edges
elements.2211.03195_968ddd1af699aa499edf0e470eb36: The system recommendations should be part of the graph, along with cotton yield and the agro-environmental conditions that interfere in this physical process
elements.2211.03195_e9c41828d52eaed04969bbfd8048b: Because the end goal is the evaluation of the recommendation system and its actual impact on yield, we designate as
elements.2211.03195_bfb254d67207ca482895a14f21556: the fields that farmers sowed on a day that was seen as favorable by the system,
elements.2211.03195_0d533ecf1fc12b2bf322c6997b7c0: the fields that were sown on a non-favorable day.
elements.2211.03195_a5e79f195a9987a789f267313cd5e: We define a day as favorable when all environmental conditions are satisfied.
elements.2211.03195_3fc1323586b6c3a8a80e61cd7a095: Binarizing the treatment in that way allows for greater flexibility in estimator selection and easier interpretation
elements.2211.03195_8a76eee7e36640ae2d3b04f7a2533: Beyond the recommendation system, multiple factors influence the decision to sow or not
elements.2211.03195_697460a3168195ecef27a2f857ae2: This is precisely the challenge we aim to address by employing a graphical analysis and explicitly modeling the farm system structure
elements.2211.03195_94bc5fe8ecc0dd6066b5088e6e1c7: The ATE we aim to estimate captures the difference between what the average yield would have been if we intervened and forced farmers to follow the recommendation by sowing on a favorable day, and the average yield if we forced them to defy the recommendation by sowing on an unfavorable day.
elements.2211.03195_8db1fb2b4bb7e6caed58e4099eedf: confounding factors are controlled for, we henceforth refer to the ATE as the
elements.2211.03195_2e340058fa984e7fc29428d6f1c28: We note that, in reality, it is impossible to account for all factors interacting in the system in order to claim that the estimated effect will not contain any bias
elements.2211.03195_dd01a01e9a4f1f87f1198d79addbd: However, because the selection of variables is deeply rooted on well-understood agro-environmental interactions (detailed analysis of graph building in A.2 of Appendix), bias is expected to be minimized, in the sense that no important interactions are left unaccounted for
elements.2211.03195_2642d803a68d39e1b905ad36752db: Furthermore, we extensively test the reliability of effect estimates through multiple refutation checks.
elements.2211.03195_8f72ba1917af46587b5368328aaf4: Because the calculation of causal effects requires access to counterfactual values that are by definition not observed
elements.2211.03195_af23a2dabb4403c4222b9f0d94404: , observational methods rely on identification techniques and assumptions that aim at reducing causal estimands such as
elements.2211.03195_0012ca9384a6d12e802e78e73734f: The back-door criterion is a popular identification method that solely relies on a graphical test to infer whether adjusting for a set of graph nodes
elements.2211.03195_22ce8852f7e6521dc5d568ca59c94: After (if) we have obtained an adjustment set of variables
elements.2211.03195_f7205ddfa5c33410d25930cf9e0a1: satisfying the back-door criterion we can identify the causal effect of
elements.2211.03195_a35eac8d1eaee17ff7ac7007b7481: In our study, ATE estimation is done with several methods of varying complexity.
elements.2211.03195_011540f6b3174b92dda55a62d2286: Linear regression and distance matching are selected as baseline estimation methods
elements.2211.03195_878f5717a6a96e7339ae7333c06b5: The popular Inverse Propensity Score (IPS) weigthing is also used
elements.2211.03195_533f9371bcac497e9ee2807d21414: We finally apply modern machine learning methods, i.e., the baseline T-learner and the state-of-the-art X-learner
elements.2211.03195_c70da851388f79238fe05b8808d19: Given the fact that ground truth estimates are not observed, we resort to performing robustness checks and sensitivity analyses of estimates, in line with recent research
elements.2211.03195_e400a8f4e212d22450f438c929a3b: We perform the following tests: i) Placebo treatment, where the treatment is randomly permuted and the estimated effect is expected to drop to
elements.2211.03195_0d42214ba33cc56098c844f80a218: ; ii) Random Common Cause (RCC), where a random confounder is added to the dataset and the estimate is expected to remain unchanged; iii) Random Subset Removal (RSR), where a subset of data is randomly selected and removed and the effect is expected to remain the same; iv) Unobserved Common Cause (UCC), where an unobserved confounder acts on the treatment and outcome without being added to the dataset, and the estimates should remain relatively stable.

elements.2211.03195_6675824e10a5126676abb85b5a893: illustrates that estimation methods are robust against refutation tests

elements.2211.03195_7e5094e8423b1c571e5837c51c5f4: For the UCC test, the mean ATE estimates are reduced yet remain positive, despite unobserved confounding of significant magnitude (more details in part A.3 of the Appendix).
elements.2211.03195_347dd2725fefd155c2ac0fb80b0c6: The results indicate that the recommendation system's advice drove a net increase in yield that was both statistically significant and robust
elements.2211.03195_2e0658cfb3f543ab3998af57628e5: Therefore, farmers are equiped with a provably valuable tool that optimizes the chances of a successful growing season with higher production, and lowers the likelihood of resorting to expensive actions and wasting resources, e.g., replanting the field.
elements.2211.03195_55f942607d6f9bc19d4a6faa02eab: In this study, we design, implement, and test a digital agriculture recommendation system for the optimal sowing of cotton
elements.2211.03195_0303c515f3341cec4509feafbcb60: Using the collected data and leveraging domain knowledge, we evaluate the impact of system recommendations on yield
elements.2211.03195_a12436b4c573a3c1ff238f94a901f: To do so, we utilize and propose causal inference as an ideal tool for empirically evaluating decision support systems
elements.2211.03195_0703ee972924b077efdbaf68d3e62: This idea can be upscaled to other digital agriculture tools as well as to different fields with well-established domain knowledge
elements.2211.03195_a1406414708798ee9bb4e7dd346a6: This paradigm is in principle different to decision support systems that frequently use black-box algorithms to predict variables of interest, but are oblivious to the evaluation of their own impact.
elements.2211.03195_153ab672305bef64e92dde8ac5c81: In that sense, this work comes to empower the farmer towards resilient agriculture, by introducing an AI framework for elaborating on the assumptions, reliability, and impact of a system that promises green and climate-smart advice.
